titles.title: Rev. Joseph A. De Laine Congressional Gold Medal Act
To authorize the President to posthumously award a gold medal on behalf of the Congress in honor of Rev. Joseph A. De Laine, in recognition of his contributions to the Nation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology and Economic Growth.

committee.subcommittee: Domestic Monetary Policy, Technology, and Economic Growth
committee.name: House Financial Services

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 6/27/2002--Introduced. Rev. Joseph A. De Laine Congressional Gold Medal Act - Authorizes the President to present on behalf of Congress a gold medal to Joseph De Laine, Jr., to honor posthumously his father, Rev. Joseph Anthony De Laine (civil rights activist), in recognition of Reverend De Laine's contributions to the Nation.
